review.comment: Dynamic company who specialise in all aspects of IT support, Cyber Security, Cloud Connectivty, Network security and the list goes on. They've been a tremendous help to us and they are certainly the UK specialists in what they do.  I wouldn't hesitate to pick up the phone if I got stuck again. They are also a Microsoft Consultancy who can help with windows virtual desktop and all aspects of helping a business work remotely and securely. I would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to secure and protect their business, and wouldn't hesitate letting anyone I know get in touch with these guys. Top people!!
review.review_reply:
Thanks Matt for your feedback! It's always a pleasure to help, especially in these uncertain times. We love to build solid secure platforms to help organisations and businesses trade in a more safer and streamlined way, even remotely where required. Thanks again for your comments, we really do appreciate them.

Kind regards,
The CloudCoCo Team

review.comment:
Top UK IT support company offering un-rivalled managed services.

Yes, we would recommend as the service we received was phenomenal and the team are really helpful. They are the experts and are great at explaining technical matters in Lehman terms. Thanks Guys well done and thanks again for your help!!
review.review_reply:
Thanks for your fantastic feedback, we really appreciate your comments and value everything you have mentioned above.

Please give us a call if you need anything, anytime.

Kind regards,
Matt
The CloudCoCo Team

review.comment:
I would highly recommend Cloudcoco if you need IT support.

We had some IT problems, so we went to Cloudcoco for help and the team were there every step of the way to fix the problems and give us peace of mind. We now use Cloudcoco for their outstanding service and wouldn’t go anywhere else.

The staff are friendly, understanding and highly responsive. Most importantly, they are extremely knowledgeable and genuinely want to help.

Thank you to all the team at Cloudcoco, we appreciate your ongoing support and wouldn’t hesitate to recommend to others.
review.review_reply:
Thank you for providing such good feedback. It's great to received feedback like this!

If we can help with anything else please don't hesitate to call the team on 0333 455 9885,

Kind regards
Peter
The CloudCoCo Team

review.comment: Great company with wide range of solutions and services that fulfil key functions that are needed by today's businesses and organisations. Great set of people working there too, knowledgeable, capable and very responsive.
review.review_reply:
Thanks Mark, that's great feedback and we really appreciate it. Our goal is always 100% client satisfaction, so your comments are truly appreciated. Thank you.

Kind regards,
Matt
The CloudCoCo Team

review.comment:
I work at CloudCoCo and would highly recommend them as a company. Having spent many years working in large IT companies it was a breath of fresh air to work at a company who puts what a customers business needs before pushing technologies which they've invested in and need to get a return from.
The team at CloudCoCo are great people to work with, they are highly skilled and want to deliver what is best for their customers.
review.review_reply:
Thanks for your review, we really value you and all the hard work everyone puts in to making CloudCoCo so successful for all of our clients, and staff.

Kind regards,
Matt
The CloudCoCo Team

review.comment: Exceptionally knowledgeable team and great service. We’ve had no end of issues with service providers in the past, but with CloudCoCo nothing was too much trouble. If you’re looking for cloud based telephony, storage, connectivity or anything else in this area I’d get in touch - highly recommended.

As we know the IT Industry is always on the move, so we're proud to be at the forefront leading the way for the Public Sector, Universities, SME's, Charity Organisations and all types of businesses to help streamline their IT.

We offer fanatical 247 support with our Managed IT services and always seek to give 100% customer satisfaction.
